get_loan_amount: To start, how much did you borrow? (0 to 1,000,000,000)
get_annual_percent: What's your annual percentage rate (APR)? (0 to 100, 5.7% would be 5.7)
get_loan_duration: How many years is your loan duration, in numbers? (0.5 to 100)
invalid_loan_amount: Borrowed amount must be a number between 0 and 1,000,000,000.
invalid_annual_percent: APR needs to be a number between 0 and 100.
invalid_duration: Loan duration needs to be a number between 0.5 and 100.
invalid_continue: Please answer with one of the following:
